recipe_name: Steamed sea bass with ginger, sesame oil and chives
author: Paul Rankin
method: Place the fish onto a small oiled plate, then place inside a bamboo steamer. Drizzle over the soy sauce and sesame oil, scatter over the ginger and pepper and steam for 6-8 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through. Serve immediately.
